general_advisory: Complete transplanting of winter vegetable crops. Use low-cost polythene cover above the vegetable nursery to avoid poor germination due to low temperature. For early and maximum yield in Cole crops spray Gibberellic Acid 0.001% L. Do proper field surveillance for pests and diseases regularly. In winter during cold or night hours, farmers should keep doors, windows, and open spaces covered to prevent direct contact with cold air.

advisory: Post-harvesting stage advice: If 'Rodent/Rats' problem is noticed, locate the rodent burrow in the crop field and surrounding areas. Place Aluminium Phosphide 6% tablet to kill the rodents.
Vegetative stage advice: To manage Tobacco Caterpillar, use Pheromone traps and spray appropriate insecticides.
Vegetative stage advice: For Aphids and Thrips infestation, spray neem-based pesticides.
Vegetative stage advice: To manage Diamond Back Moth infestation, spray neem-based pesticides.
Planting advice: November is the optimum time for planting of dwarf variety of banana. Use Dwarf Cavendish and Robusta variety.
Make necessary arrangements to provide heat especially to chicks during night hours. Keep poultry house clean.
